author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Face the Music
After days of controversy, Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg released a statement on the social-media behemoth’s user-data crisis, which has renewed calls for governments to better regulate tech companies that hold enormous quantities of information about their users. Saying Facebook has already taken many steps to address user privacy in recent years but also “made mistakes,” he added “there’s more to do, and we need to step up and do it.” According to Mr. Zuckerberg, the steps will include an investigation...
